short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension highlights active Adobe Target activities, such as A/B tests on a webpage and other Target activities in effect.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Puppy Chrome Extension is exclusively designed for Adobe Target end-users. This tool instantly identifies and showcases active Adobe Target activities, including A/B tests on webpages, as well as other ongoing Target activities. 

By simply clicking on the listed items in the extension's popup, users can access detailed insights into the activity and the kinds of modifications being applied to the page.


Key Features:

1. Real-time Experience Monitoring: With Adobe Target Insights, you can easily monitor all active experiences running on your website in real time.

2. Custom Code Visibility: Wondering if custom code has been added to any experience? This extension provides you with the ability to see the code associated with any listed test. Simply click on the test, and you can view and copy the custom code integrated into your experiences.

3. Adobe Target Version Detection: Get to know the Adobe Target version the website is using. This extension offers a quick and easy way to identify the version.

We sincerely appreciate your interest in the Puppy Chrome Extension and welcome any feedback, thoughts, or ideas you may have. Please feel free to contact us at theraseshsingh@gmail.com, and our team will promptly respond to your inquiries.
